amendment.description: Amendment directs the SBA Administrator to give consideration to investments for small businesses that are creating new technologies, manufactured goods, or materials, or providing services to reduce carbon emissions in the United States, reduce the use of non-renewable resources; minimize environmental impact and relate people with the natural environment.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 110-350 to direct the SBA Administrator to give consideration to investments for small businesses that are creating new technologies, manufactured goods, or materials, or providing services to reduce carbon emissions in the US; reduce the use of non-renewable resources; minimize environmental impact and relate people with the natural environment.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Inslee amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
